item.title: Ecuador’s Ana Cristina Barragán on Her Venice Horizons Pic, ‘The Ivy’: ‘I’m Once Again Drawn to Exploring Childhood Wounds’
item.description: Recurring themes run through Ana Cristina Barragán’s third feature “The Ivy” (“Hiedra”), which world premieres Sept. 3 in Venice’s Horizons sidebar. As in her first two highly personal films, “Alba” a
